title: Whiskey Sour - Liliana Hart

organizations.name: addison holmes mysteries - an addison holmes mystery

text:
Book 2, Addison Holmes Mysteries - An Addison Holmes Mystery Liliana Hart 
  
Addison Holmes is at it again. When priceless Russian gems are stolen on their way to Savannah and the courier is murdered, all the clues lead back to an escort service that seems above reproach. But looks can be deceiving. Throw in a sexy detective and a dangerous FBI agent, and Addison finds out very quickly that she's in way over her head. But nothing is going to stop her from getting her man. Customer Reviews by Erin1121 Hilarious! I laughed so hard I was crying. I thought the first book in this series was the best, but this one blew me away. Great writing. Dane by Maime ham I felt like I had turned the television on late one night, only to discover a wonderful love story. The read was so smooth I truly felt it was televised just for me. The characters of Dane, Charlie and Dane's brother made feel like I had known the for the ten year span of the novella. I would recommend this book for anyone who needs, a sweet love story with a good ending. Love it!
